Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Radiopharmaceutical Compound/Radioconjugate/I 131 Liothyronine,/NCIThesaurus/Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Therapeutic Hormone/Thyroid Agent/Liothyronine/I 131 Liothyronine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A radioconjugate of synthetic active thyroid hormone, liothyronine (T3), labeled with Iodine 131. Liothyronine involves many important metabolic functions and is essential to the proper development and differentiation of all cells. I131 liothyronine may be used in radiotherapy in thyroid cancers.
